snippet.title: Puyo Puyo CD 2/Tsu (1996, PC-Engine) - 2 of 4: Rally Mode (Arrange1)[1080p60]
snippet.description:
Puyo Puyo 2/Tsu for the PC-Engine/Turbografx-16.

This takes the unlockable "Rally" mode that you can access after completing the normal mode (or special control code). With fully voiced cut scenes!
Most of the cut scenes seems to have been taken out of Standard and Ketteiban variants of Tsu.

Special shout out to LarviStar for revealing how to unlock this mode [ https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnDs1dEIxvafvORfOcwiJZg ]
————————————————————————————
Puyo Puyo Games for the PC-Engine:

== Puyo Puyo CD ==
Training Levels — http://youtu.be/FgW1UM_JI
Original Script — http://youtu.be/OVOQXxNeTo0
Remixed Script — http://youtu.be/JrF18Yz4bH0

== Puyo Puyo CD 2/Tsu ==
Normal Mode — https://youtu.be/wBkooXQaVeI
Rally Mode Arrange 1 — https://youtu.be/jVkQeFexIDY
Rally Mode Arrange 2 — https://youtu.be/-aoAPRy-2M0
Character Chains — https://youtu.be/ZTTGQUwW2Eg
————————————————————————————
See my collection of Puyo Puyo (Compile & Spinoff) gameplays here
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLnK-0g_LLzdxZsIK_DlrhmXrTLBhWfUvK

See my collection of Puyo Puyo (Sonic Team) gameplays here
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLnK-0g_LLzdxzJs4LkRkWYCIrnC0m5iAl
————————————————————————————
#rubycored #puyopuyo #ぷよぷよ
